channel.title: Pleased with basic design but struggling with flair
channel.description:
Hi :) I've created a basic site and I'm very pleased with how it's coming along so far, but I'm struggling to get a good colour scheme going [b]at all[/b]. I've tried to go for grey with bright accents but it just isn't working, so I'd appreciate any help with colours but any constructive criticism of the overall site would also be appreciated :)
The site can be seen at www.jamesmonger.com
Parts I've attempted colour in can be seen in URLs, when hovering over URLs and when selecting text.
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Pleased with basic design but struggling with flair
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

Kidpaparoach:

The one that’s up currently, I’d really appreciate it thanks.

Sure, go ahead It’s not finished yet so you’ll have to do quite a bit of work yourself.

item.title: Pleased with basic design but struggling with flair
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

Kidpaparoach:

It looks nice for what you intend to do. Fancy giving me a copy for me to use, I’m making a portfolio for my still image editing class and I think your site would be nice to use :P. Ofc all credit would go to you for the website.

Which version of the site are you looking at? I’ve had three different designs up recently

[quote=“nickb, post:7, topic:515621”]At some way I like the colors.
May I ask what for work you are gonne place on your site? (like web development, random things?)[/quote]
Mainly web development but a general portfolio as well as a blog.

Read full topic

item.title: Pleased with basic design but struggling with flair
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

SilentCJ:

I find it hard to judge anything of my own unless there is a fair bit of content, what is the site going to be exactly? Can often help with the colours.

I’ve got another colour scheme going now and I like it but I’m not sure yet - will have to wait and see! The site will just be a place where I can post work that I do.

Read full topic

item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

SilentCJ:

I find it hard to judge anything of my own unless there is a fair bit of content, what is the site going to be exactly? Can often help with the colours.

That’s what I was thinking. I didn’t really want to give any feedback because I felt it lacked content or things to look at. I

OT: I have the same difficulties as you. I’m not a designer so pink and grey would make me happy lol

@Ambokile wrote:

Yeah, that’s what I’m struggling with. I’m pleased with the general site but I’m really not sure which direction I can go in with the colours so I’d appreciate anyone who can give me some tips.

I’ve added some colours and CSS patterns (tile patterns generated in CSS) - can someone give me a review now?
